name: Rouen_Bonded_Leather_Recliner_Motion_Living_Room_Set
reviews: It is beautiful but the recliner broke after 8 months. If you buy it, make sure you buy the warranty because it covers for 5 years

I have never written a product review before, but had such a good experience with Overstock that I had to comment. I picked this furniture out because we had just gotten new hardwood floors and wanted something classy and different from the suede sectionals we've had in the past. I wasn't sure what I would get for $$$$ but this furniture turned out to be beyond my expectations. I ordered on a Sunday night and the delivery service called on Wednesday to schedule delivery. I had the furniture set up in my family room in less than a week from the day I ordered. It it classy, firm, comfortable and great quality. I would definitely recommend it and will buy from Overstock again.
description:
Bring an elegant, modern look to your living area with this beautiful leather reclining furniture set. Included in this wonderful set are a sofa, a loveseat and a chair, providing ample seating for your family and guests. The gorgeous bonded leather upholstery is available in a variety of colors, allowing you to easily incorporate this fantastic set into any decor style.
Set includes: 1 Motion Loveseat, 1 Motion Sofa, 1 Rocker / ReclinerDimensions: Loveseat: 60inches long x 38 inches wide x 40 inches height, sofa: 82 inches long x 38 inches wide x 40inches height, rocker/recliner: 38 inches long x 38 inches wide x 40 inches height.The single chair is both recliner and rocker.Materials: Hardwood, metal, bonded leatherUpholstery color: Black, espresso, burgundyStyleContemporaryMaterialLeather, Metal, WoodTypeLoveseat, SofaAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBlack, Brown, RedFurniture PatternSolid
